A ‘Goose that’s equally at home on a rural bike path as it is in a city center, the new Kaldi Double is ready for commuting and taking in the sights!

• Heat treated aluminum frame with comfort geometry gives you a lightweight, resilient ride that’s easy on your back and hands
  • Shimano 24-speed drivetrain offers plenty of gear options for casual riders and commuters
  • Mongoose/Velo Comfort Design saddle and Ergo Comfort Dual Density grips keep you well cushioned and composed throughout your ride
  • Tektro 837 linear-pull brakes provide perfectly modulated stopping power
  • Continental Sport Contact tires combine excellent handling with a durable and supple riding experience
  • Insulated mug with aluminum handlebar cage is perfect for transporting your favorite beverage
  • Full fenders keep your ride clean, dry and eliminate “spray” in wet conditions
Leave your competition fumbling in the dark and blaze ahead with this intense light

• Dual beam halogen bulbs with your choice of 10, 15 or 25 watt output provides up to two hours of shadow-cutting, illumination
  • Universal handlebar mount with remote switch makes power adjustment a cinch
  • 6V NiMh battery with nine hour overnight charger stows easily in your pocket or mounts onto your frame
Smooth and nearly effortless, 9-speed shifting action that’s light, rigid and stiff.

• Special tooth profiles, pick-up spikes and ramps help make your shifts quiet, easy and trouble-free
  • Up-shifts are amazingly fast, crisp and won’t compromise pedaling efficiency
  • Lightweight aluminum construction provides better power transfer, acceleration and speed
Whether you’re a commuter looking for extra visibility or just don’t like getting caught unprepared, this lightweight and compact light is just what you need.

• Two low-profile chip LEDs are powered by two CR-2032 batteries to supply you with just the right amount of light
  • Versatile mounting strap means this light will mount nearly anywhere you need extra visibility
  • Flashing or steady modes
From gusty winds to drizzling rain, this outer shell delivers the perfect amount of protection for early Spring and Fall riding.

• Shields you from the elements when you need it and stows in a pocket when you don’t!
  • Pearl Izumi’s Zephrr fabric now features even more wind-resistance, water-repellency, breathability and softness, plus new design lines for a more flattering fit
  • Soft, micromesh collar ensures comfortable warmth
  • Full length zipper with draft flap blocks cold winds
  • Reflective piping and logos keep you visible in low light conditions
  • Elasticized wrists and waist lock in heat
  • Rear stow pocket with internal key pocket for stashing the essentials
The embodiment of style, function and fit doesn’t just belong on the Paris runway; it also belongs on the bike!

• Descente’s Bliss Lite fabric is a 200g polyester/spandex blend that marries buttery softness with excellent support and performance
  • D-Lux Mesh side panels deliver breathable comfort
  • Full shelf bra with extended support and plush elastic trim keeps those blossoming bosoms in line
  • T-back design adds the right amount of compression for activity
  • Gently flattering, non-elastic hem hits at just the right spot and is tailored specifically for women
  • Stash all your accessories in two rear pockets
Whether it’s a chilly, screaming descent or just a chilly, morning ride, this vest is just the thing to keep your chest warm and your core temp up.

• MicroAir front with MicroMesh back provides lightweight breathability, wicks away moisture and cuts through the wind without breaking a sweat!
  • Mesh AirDry underarm inserts keep you well ventilated
  • Full length, 2-way zipper with inner flap blocks chilly winds
  • Adjustable drawstring hem provides a comfortable fit
  • Reflective accents throughout add visibility
  • Two back pockets handle the rest of your gear
Everything you need to look and feel like a pro: cool style, sweat protection and warmth when you need it.

• Lightweight cotton twill construction absorbs sweat when the weather turns hot
  • Easily fits under your helmet for extra warmth when the weather turns cool
  • Authentic team colors and logos give you a competitive look
  • Wear the bill up or down for extra shade
  • Elastic back offers a snug fit for any size head
GORE BIKE WEAR Helmet Cap III
Unlike other bicycle caps, this one doesn’t forget about your ears!

• Windstopper Soft Shell fabric guards against bitter winds while maintaining dry warmth and comfort in any condition
  • Small holes around the ears keep you hearing clearly
  • Elasticized tape on the hem provides a snug fit
  • Reflective logo adds visibility
  • Sizes: M(21-23”), L(23-24.5”)
Castelli has captured the warmth of an overstuffed winter jacket and put it in this jersey that’s so lightweight, you’ll feel like H.G Wells “Invisible Man.”

• Thermoflex fabric with a fleece lining traps in warm air, enhances breathability and stretches to keep you aerodynamic, all while remaining nearly weightless!
  • ½ length zipper puts you in control of your temperature
  • Thumb loops keep your sleeves in place for further protection from the elements
  • Three rear pockets with a zippered key pocket hold all your cold weather essentials

The century ride - a rite of passage for every cyclist. And if you’re brave enough to set out on such a feat when the weather turns cool, then you better be wearin’ these tights over your favorite pair of shorts!

• A heavier (8.5oz) version of the nylon/Lycra fabric we use in our Century Shorts will keep your legs warm from your waist, all the way down to your ankles
  • 4-panel design offers a comfortable and relaxed fit
  • Elastic waist with drawstring gives you customized comfort
  • Gripper elastic leg openings keep this tight perfectly in place
  • UPF 50+ application blocks 98% of UV rays
  • Ideal for 45-60° conditions
Retro style for changing weather conditions!

• ClimaLite knit fabric transfers sweat away from your skin to enhance your body’s natural temperature regulation
  • Elastic grippers at the upper arm and wrist provide a no-slip fit and won't allow cold air to creep in
  • Flatlock seams throughout add comfort
  • Sizes: S/M, L/XL (Order By Jersey Size)
Urban style meets the rugged trail in this slick-looking shoe.

Durable rubber outsole with stiff midsole offers incredible grip and a powerful pedal stroke for when you’re dodging city traffic or aiming to miss that root in the trail
Suede leather upper with nylon mesh inserts keep your feet breathably cool
E.V.A. padding provides comfortable support
Lace it up to your liking with the snappy black and white shoe ties
Compatible with 2-bolt SPD-style, Time ATAC and Eggbeater-style cleats or simply leave the sole’s rubber cleat plug intact for use with toe clips and straps
Designed for lightning fast transitions and bike splits.

• Single reverse pull strap (so it doesn't get hung up in the chain when running through the transition area) and dual finger loops allow you to be on your way faster than ever
  • Ventilated upper paired with a super-stiff ventilated sole provides plenty of airflow to keep your feet cool and dry
  • Soft, comfortable neoprene liner
K2’s commuter machine, with features to make sure you're seen!

• Butted cross frame with Reflex Road tuning and aluminum fork gives you a lightweight and resilient ride
  • K2 Bike Fit System stem supplies personalized bar height without the extra weight
  • Shimano 27-speed drivetrain offers an efficient gear ratio for every situation
  • Gear indicators in the Shimano Sora S.T.I. shifters eliminate shifting confusion
  • Selle Royal Dardo saddle with padding and K2 weather-resistant gel tape increase comfort and control
  • LED light on the saddle cover, lighted end plugs and reflective tire stripes add visibility in low light conditions
  • Cantilever brakes are UCI legal and still allow for a wide tire clearance
  • Vittoria Adventure Tour tires add traction and control in wet conditions
  • Rear rack mounts let you add a rack when you need to transport extra gear
A lighter, more responsive bike for aspiring road riders!

• Lighter, more compliant ride thanks to a butted frame with Reflex Road tubing
  • Carbon fiber seatstays and bladed fork smooth out the road ahead
  • K2 Bike Fit System stem supplies personalized bar height without the extra weight
  • Shimano Tiagra 18-speed drivetrain with compact cranks and S.T.I. shifters offer plenty of quick, easy and efficient gearing options for the climbs
  • Shimano Tiagra dual-pivot brakes will have you stopping on a dime
  • Wellgo clipless pedals give you more power in every rotation
  • Continental Ultra Race tires provide comfort and exceptional handling, especially on rough or wet road surfaces
  • A-Class ALX 200 wheelset for a super-lightweight ride that doesn’t compromise on strength
Designed for the recreational rider who wants maximum comfort for the long road ahead, the Mach 2.0 is a complete joy to ride!

• Aluminum Recreational Road frame with Reflex tubing provides a stiff and lightweight ride
  • Carbon bladed fork smoothes out the road ahead
  • K2 Bike Fit System stem supplies personalized bar height without the extra weight
  • Shimano 27-speed drivetrain offers an efficient gear ratio for every situation
  • Gear indicators in the Shimano Sora S.T.I. shifters eliminate shifting confusion
  • Selle Royal Dardo saddle with padding and K2 foam/gel grips increase comfort and control
  • Shimano dual-pivot calipers deliver excellent stopping power
  • Vittoria Zaffiro tires for flexible comfort and puncture resistance
  • Rear rack mounts let you add a rack when you need to transport extra gear
Perfect for bikes without dropout eyelets or dual-suspension bikes.

• Secures with four Allen bolts
  • Fits seatpost sizes 25.0-31.8mm
  • 20lb load capacity
Nirve Paul Frank Aku Single Speed

Nirve's attractive style has caught the eye of some of today's top artists and brands. Each brand contributes its own unique personality to create some of the most fun and fashionable bicycles on the planet. Complete with basket and bell, the reptilian green Aku Cruiser from Paul Frank is ready roll to any adventure!

• Durable, steel frame is strong, resilient and ensures a smooth ride on the boardwalk or down the street
  • Wide, upright handlebars with full fenders and alligator graphics give this ride a fun, retro look
  • Front basket carries everything you need and the “I love my bike” bell lets everyone know that you’re in the neighborhood
  • Alligator print saddle with dual springs keeps your backside comfortable
  • Rear coaster brake delivers rapid braking power no matter what the weather forecast
The pinnacle of Schwinn’s indoor cycling line, the Evolution IC Sleeveless Jersey is built to withstand countless hours of cardio-intense exercise on your favorite resistance unit!

• Polyester fabric with inherent stretch wicks away moisture and comfortably moves with you when the cadence is high
  • 16” zipper puts generous ventilation at your fingertips
  • Schwinn Quality logo adds competitive style
  • Rear zippered pocket holds all your indoor training essentials
  • Elastic hem with silicone for a comfortable fit
Built to provide the best grip and the most comfort you can get your hands on.

• Fox’s innovative full thumb and ¾ index finger improves shifting control and makes glove removal a snap
  • Stretch Spandura panels on the upper side, wick away sweat to keep your hands dry
  • Embossed Airprene knuckles enhance flexibility
  • Double layer Clarino palm with patterned perforations absorbs shock while further enhancing airflow and breathability
  • Clarino reinforced thumb adds durability
  • Easy, Velcro closure

A high that’ll last as long as you ride! The Acid 2 pedal fills the gap between the cross-country Candy and the downhill Mallet to give you the perfect fix for enduro and gravity racing. Now designed with magnesium and carbon for a nearly “weightless” cycling experience!

• Utilizes the same proven retention system from the infamous Eggbeater pedal with a larger, more robust platform design for greater stability and increased power transfer
  • Magnesium/carbon fiber body with chromoly steel spindle and stamped steel wings give you an exceptionally lightweight and vibration damping ride while maintaining strength for technical descents and hard landings
  • 2-sided pedal surface offers firm support for your foot over rough terrain
  • 4-sided entry gives you quick, no-hassle engagement and release while remaining impervious to dirt and mud
If you’re looking to turn your ride into a true racing machine, then this deep dish, carbon wheelset for tubular tires is as good as it gets!

• Ultra-light carbon fiber rims achieve a new level of smooth performance, speed, and strength to weight ratio
  • Tubular design provides unmatched acceleration, cornering, climbing and road feel
  • Aerodynamically designed, 50mm high profile rims give you a wind-cheating advantage in time trials and road races
  • Wear indicator tells you when its time for a replacement
  • 16 x 20 butted and bladed spokes reduce air resistance and are centered on a quick engaging, freehub body for greater power transmission
  • Angular contact bearings with oversized, 7075 aluminum axles help counter flex for a stiff, precise ride
Designed to take all the abuse you can dish-out the Loco wheelset is a freerider's dream.

• Designed to take all the abuse you can dish-out the Loco wheelset is a freerider's dream.
  • Oversized disc rims with 32 spokes laced 3-cross for reliable strength and durability
  • Get extra front wheel stiffness for the trail with an included 20-mm thru-axle conversion kit
  • Maintenance-free, sealed bearings
  • For use with Disc brakes only
Mavic Crossmax SLR Disc Rear Wheel

Take the incredible spec list from the Crossmax SL, add a titanium quick release, plus some fast racing graphics and you get the Crossmax SLR – the World’s highest performing cross country race-wheel.

• UST tubeless wheel is Maxtal ISM lightened with an SUP welded rim for serious weight reduction, less vibration and fewer flats over rough terrain
  • Fore technology adds greater rigidity and stiffness to the rim
  • Red FTS-X cassette body boasts strengthened prawls and self-locking axle end screws to meet the demands of hard wearing, MTB riding
  • 24 (Isopulse) Zicral, short spokes (with one red) reduce tension cycles, balance spokes tensions from side to side, reduce material fatigue and improve wheel endurance
  • Shimano 8/9-speed compatible
  • Compatible with UST and standard tires/tubes
Whether you’re a resident of the Liberty City or you just want a perfect match for your Scattante Liberty City Single Speed Road Bike, this classic cap will get the job done!

• Lightweight cotton twill construction with a flip-up visor fits comfortably over your head and keeps you cool
  • KoolFit elastic band around the perimeter rapidly wicks away moisture from your forehead and transports it to the surface within seconds
  • Twill taped inner seams for a chafe-free experience
A rack designed for mounting a set of pannier bags on bikes without threaded eyelets or full suspension bikes.

• Heat-treated 6000 series aluminum with powdercoat finish is tough enough to handle your gear
  • Easily attaches to the seatpost of most bikes using a forged 4-bolt clamp
  • Accepts panniers, rack trunks, baskets or bags
  • Curved for seat clearance
  • 25lb. load capacity

Remember those comfy “moon boots” that Mom made you wear in the wintertime? They made you feel like you were walking on marshmallows! That’s why we couldn’t resist the Moon shoe from Northwave. Not only do these shoes have the technical features you need to go hard, they feel so luxuriously comfortable, you’ll never want to take them off!

• NRG thermoplastic sole delivers lightweight stiffness while remaining flexible enough for stellar pedal performance
  • Airflow System with polyurethane improves ventilation and increases stability
  • Air Sport footbed offers the perfect amount of support and cushioning
  • Lift Stop heel places your foot in its most natural position for efficient power transfer
  • Two Velcro straps provide a secure fit
A cost-efficient shoe designed for the entry-level cyclist.

• Fiberglass-reinforced nylon outer sole increases stability while improving pedaling efficiency to keep you going strong
  • Lightweight, synthetic leather and mesh upper offer cooling ventilation during those hard efforts
  • Triple hook and loop, Velcro straps provide a custom fit
Pearl Izumi X-Alp Seek MTB Shoe
Pearl has taken the lightweight upper from their Seek running shoe and combined it with the award winning X-Alp outsole, to give you comfortable performance for all your hiking and biking pursuits.

• R&R nylon plate delivers exceptional power transfer to your pedals when you’re on the bike
  • Flexible forefoot and beveled heel offer the agility you need when you’re off the bike
  • Carbon rubber lugged outsole provides superior traction and mud shedding

  • Low cut design for a light, fast, fit and feel

Looking for low-profile platforms? This is your pedal!
• Durable alloy body accepts toe clips and straps
Time ATAC XS Carbon MTB Pedal
From the makers of the popular ATAC pedal comes the XS Carbon; a pedal with a smaller, lighter weight pedal body that performs better in any condition.

• Durable, lightweight carbon body, aluminum spring and chromoly axle create a solid connection to the cranks for total power transfer without a lot of added weight

  • Self-cleaning design sheds mud like no other

Rosie, the carefree rider on the back of this saddle, has come to life to liberate YOU and YOUR TUSH with comfort beyond your wildest dreams!

Unique, seamless cutaway through the nose relieves pressure on soft tissues
Slightly wider rear section offers exceptional support of a woman’s sit bones
Extra padding keeps you cycling in luxurious comfort, without compromising one bit of performance
FeC alloy rails deliver lightweight strength
Smooth leather cover with Rosie graphic on the back offers one small piece of advice…“ride like a girl!”
Summer cycling is all about freedom and spontaneity. That’s why Keen designed an SPD sandal that’ll take you from bike to hike in cool, comfortable style. Trust us…your feet will thank you!

An expert level, off-road shoe that will transfer all your energy straight to the pedals!

Gear up for the road ahead in this performance-ready shoe created for female cyclists.

Forte’s exclusive women’s-specific design provides a custom fit and superior comfort for the female foot
Co-molded composite outsole with vented, fiberglass reinforced nylon provides the stiffness you need to pedal efficiently
Lightweight, PU coated leather and nylon mesh panels add durability and breathability
Stabilizing, molded heel cup and vented, E.V.A. insole is contoured for comfortable, foot retention
Two Velcro straps and one ratchet with strap firmly secures your foot for maximum stability, leverage and performance

GT Mach One Pro BMX Bike

K2 T:Nine Alliance Ladies Road Bike
An enthusiastic, road-ready bike inspired and developed by K2’s T:Nine Alliance Team!

If you want baptism by air, here’s your ride. Not only does this bike clear big jumps with ease, its tough, chromoly frame feels nearly weightless when you’re off the ground! Add on 100mm of front suspension to cushion the drops and 3-piece cranks for that sweet barspin, and you’ve got yourself a ride that can tackle anything on the ground or in the air.

Attach this rack to any bike - full suspension bikes or road bikes without braze-ons.

  • 25lb. capacity
Perfect for a trip to the market or a lazy afternoon ride with your favorite pet, this euro-style basket puts simplicity back into your summer days!

  • Fits most bikes

Road Bike Action, March/April 2008 - THE VERDICT - “Sometimes a good idea is only that, but with the Prologue, a good idea created a nice bike for not just the true beginner, but for someone who wants to put a few seasons on a worthy steed and save enough money to travel to enter and travel to events. This isn’t a low-level road bike frame with aerobars slapped on - it’s designed, built and outfitted with a purpose. There are a few companies out there who have a lower-end Tri/TT bike, but few are available with out-of-the-box bar-end shifting, an aero-specific design and a solid component package for $999. Good work, Schwinn.”

  • Mesh inserts along the side and a 12” front zipper keep you cool and well ventilated
  • Amy and Mynx applications achieve a 30+ UPF rating for protection during the day
  • Reflective trim enhances visibility at night
  • Two rear pockets hold all the essentials

• Polyester fabric draws moisture away from your skin for quick, cooling evaporation
  • Omni-Shade technology with UPF 30 blocks 95% of the sun’s UV rays
  • Casual fit, set-in sleeves and crew neck add easy style

Maybe it’s the morning newspaper, your favorite pastry and a thermos of warm coffee that you like to keep within arms reach. Or perhaps you just need a place to stash a bag of groceries or a safe area to collect items for transport. Whatever your intent, we’ve got a tough basket that’ll carry all your items in easy style.

• Sturdy, steel mesh construction is built to withstand normal wear n’ tear and will give you years of durable service
  • Quickly attaches and detaches from the quick release bracket
  • Use the integrated handles to carry the basket to your next location
  • Quick release bracket is compatible with most standard handlebars
Streamlined and stylish, this jersey will go wherever the prevailing wind leads you…

• H2Zero vapor-channel fabric feels incredibly soft against your skin and wicks away moisture for unsurpassed comfort
  • Full length zipper gives you plenty of ventilation
  • Contoured raglan sleeve design offers a greater range of motion
  • Tapered collar keeps you looking sleek and aerodynamic
  • Soft-tension elastic at the hem and sleeves for a perfect fit
  • Three rear pockets with hidden MP3 pocket hold your gear and favorite tunes

If you’re climbing the magnificent Passo Dello Stelvio in the Eastern Alps or attempting that challenging accent just around the corner, then these lightweight specs are just what you need to stay clear and focused.

Durable Grilamid TR-90 frame with a polycarbonate, decentered lens eliminates prismatic distortion and increases optical clarity
Fototec technology adjusts the tint level to match your surroundings
Glare Guard reflective coating reduces eye fatigue
Side vents ramp up air circulation to eliminate fogging
Hydrophilic rubber temples and adjustable nose piece provide a no-slip grip
100% UVA/UVB protection
Fits medium to large faces
Accommodates prescription adapter
Case with microfiber cleaning bag included
Gunmetal frame comes with a High Speed Red Fototec lens (35-12% light transmission)
The lovely graphics on this exceptionally lightweight jersey paint a picture of sophisticated style that is sure to get noticed.

• Micro C fabric with 3-way stretch wicks moisture away from your skin while you enjoy the ride
  • 10” zipper puts cooling ventilation within reach
  • Contoured cut with a raglan sleeve design follows your curves for a flattering fit
  • Reflective details enhance visibility at night
  • Three back pockets carry all the essentials

Looking out your window on a cold winter morning usually produces a mental list of excuses as to why it would be better to stay in bed. So when we stumbled upon Cannondale’s Foul Weather tight, were surprised and delighted to find that it gave us many more reasons to head outside!

• Thermal HydroGrid fabric with 4-way stretch provides full water and windproof protection and unsurpassed breathability and flexibility; especially where your joints need the most mobility
  • Strategic seam construction follows your muscular-skeletal pattern for unparalleled fit, range of motion and comfort
  • Reflective accents offer 360° of visibility
  • Knee gussets further enhance flexibility
  • 10” leg zippers make it easy to get in and out of these tights
  • Drawstring waist gives you a custom fit
  • Internal stash pocket at hip will hold your cash, credit cards or keys
Precision-engineered to combine aerodynamics, light weight and the strength to handle hard training!

• Deep 27mm aero alloy rim with machined braking surface
  • 20 (1x) bladed, stainless steel spokes increase aerodynamics
  • Smooth sealed cartridge bearing hubs require no maintenance
  • Strong and light alloy axle
  • Shimano 8/9/10-speed compatible
An excellent, entry-level, all-around wheelset at an affordable price.

• 30mm aero rims with 20 front and 24 rear Sapim straight pull spokes are built lightweight and stiff for speedy ascents and even quicker descents
  • V2 Series hubs with precision-sealed cartridge bearings and laser etched graphics are durable and easy to maintain
  • Alloy oversized, inboard ratchet system with durable 3-pawl system and machined collar delivers frictionless performance while offering protection from water and other road contaminants
2008 Mongoose Tyax Comp Disc Mountain Bike - U.S. Exclusive

• Aluminum hardtail frame is lightweight and delivers solid performance on the trail
  • 100mm of plush front suspension adds control and comfort in variable terrain
  • Shimano 24-speed drivetrain with 11/32T cassette gives you plenty of gearing options to choose from
  • EZ Fire trigger shifters for quick and effortless shifts
  • Aluminum handlebar, stem and adjustable seatpost supply core-level strength, style and performance
  • Kenda Komodo tires use a non-directional tread design to shed mud without compromising speed
  • ProMax mechanical disc brakes provide low maintenance, all-weather stopping power

This winning CX racer will having you weaving through tight turns, climbing up unrelenting hills, traveling over jagged terrain, blasting through mucky conditions and conquering anything else that gets in its way!

• 7005 butted aluminum frame is lightweight, strong and rigid
  • Carbon bladed fork and seatpost dampens vibrations and offers a smooth, stiff ride
  • FSA Gossamer MegaExo compact cranks give you a sleek and powerful pedal stroke for the flats and the climbs
  • Shimano 105 drivetrain combines reliable speed and high performance with incredible control and response
  • Carbon/aluminum seatpost with aluminum stem and handlebar guarantees core-level strength, style and performance
  • Kenda K-932 tires provide excellent traction and stability without compromising speed
  • Alex ALX 270 wheelset cuts through the wind with bladed spokes, aero rims and smooth rolling hubs
  • Tektro 992AG linear-pull brakes deliver perfectly modulated stopping power

The Transeo 1.0 has everything you’ve been looking for! It’s lightweight, thanks to the 7005 aluminum frame with hydroformed top tube and cold forged 3D dropouts. It’s fast, due to the 700c wheels that’ll keep you on the go. It’s powerful, because the linear-pull brakes will stop you in your tracks. It’s comfortable, because it boasts an anatomical saddle and soft grips. Each of these features compliments the upright geometry and ergonomics of this fitness machine perfectly.

• GT 7000 Series butted aluminum frame with Sport Fitness Geometry is built for lightweight speed and durable comfort
  • Suspension fork smoothes out the rough stuff on the road or trail
  • Shimano/SRAM 27-speed drivetrain with RapidFire shifting gives you quick access to plenty of gearing options
  • Selle San Marco Ischia K saddle and dual density grips add comfort over uneven terrain
  • ProMax direct-pull brakes provide excellent stopping power
  • WTB All Terrainasaurus tires are perfect for rough roads and packed trails
  • Double wall Alex rims with Shimano hubs maintain strength and rigidity

Ideal for bike paths, country roads and jaunts into town, this easy-rider uses cross/comfort geometry, inside-the-stays disc mounts and semi-aggressive tires to give you exceptional comfort and performance wherever you ride.

• Mongoose aluminum frame with cross/comfort geometry puts you in a more upright position for easy pedaling
  • 63mm of air sprung, front suspension gives you plush comfort over uneven terrain
  • FSA Alpha Drive triple cranks with SRAM/SR Suntour drivetrain offers tons of gear options for the hills and the flats
  • Mongoose aluminum handlebars, seatpost and stem deliver core-level strength, style and performance
  • Tektro IO mechanical disc brakes deliver rapid and controlled stopping power in any condition
  • Ritchey SpeedMax Delta tires keep you firmly planted on the trail or road
  • Durable Alex rims with Formula disc hubs maintain strength and rigidity no matter what you encounter
  • Ergo Comfort Dual Density grips and Mongoose Performance Hybrid saddle supply extra cushioning

“If you’re looking for one bike that’ll tackle any sort of riding with enthusiasm, help you out when speed overruns skill and make sure you finish every ride grinning, we’d go for ‘Goose’s golden egg!” - Mountain Biking Magazine.

• Aluminum frame with FreeDrive design and slightly relaxed 69.5° head angle tackles loose-over-hard terrain with ease and responds quickly when its time to pick up speed
  • Rock Shox Tora 318 Air fork with 100mm of travel delivers smooth, predictable and reliable bump absorption over uneven terrain
  • Fox Float R gives you a wide range of compression control for incredibly accurate suspension tuning
  • Shimano XT drivetrain provides flawless shifting and performance on all types of terrain
  • Hayes Stroker Trail hydraulic disc brakes guarantee rapid and controlled stopping power in any condition
  • WTB Speed Disc XC rims with Shimano M525 hubs and Kenda Small Block Eight DCT tires offer the lightweight stability and traction you need on technical trails

Monty’s Maniacs are a definite highlight at any SDSU basketball game! From loud, heckling cries to the mocking display of large celebrity faces, these die-hard fans in the student section sure know how to taunt and terrify the visiting team!   • Fits anyone up to 6’6
